column1: #Text=" Sokka says : " He still should n't have to face this alone .
#Text=" Aang says : " The sun has set .
#Text=Well ... spirit ... uhhh ... I hereby ask you to please leave this village in peace .
#Text=Okay ... well ... I guess that 's settled , then .
#Text=" Aang says : " You must be the Hei Bai spirit .
#Text=My name is – " Aang says : " My name 's Aang !
#Text=I 'm the Avatar and I would like to help .
#Text=Uhhh ... " Senlin Village leader says : " The Avatar 's methods are ... unusual .
#Text=" Sokka says : " It does n't seem too interested in what he 's saying .
#Text=Only the Avatar stands a chance against the Hei Bai .
#Text=" Katara says : " Aang will figure out the right thing to do , Sokka .
#Text=" Aang says : " Please , would you stop destroying things and listen ?
#Text=I 'm trying to do my job as spirit bridge !
#Text=Excuse me , would you please turn around ?
#Text=I command you to turn around now !
#Text=" Senlin Village leader says : " It 's not safe !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Hei Bai , over here !
#Text=" Sokka says : " We 'll fight him together , Aang .
#Text=" Aang says : " I do n't want to fight him unless I – " Katara says : " Sokka !
#Text=" Fire Nation Soldier says : " Sir , maybe he thought you left without him .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Something 's not right here .
#Text=" Fire Nation Soldier says : " It looks like there 's been a landslide , sir .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Land does n't slide uphill .
